did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

bioghist.p: Kelly was a pilot for United Air Lines and a member of Air Lines Pilot Association Executive Board for many years, in the 1940s and 1950s. He also served on the system board of adjustment.

scopecontent.p: The papers include cases presented before the system board of adjustment and discussions of health benefits for pilots and stewardesses.
Also included are the papers of H.W. Reid, a member of UAL's Master Executive Council in the early 1950s.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Edward J. Kelly Papers #5867. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
